name: Coconut Chicken with Green Beans
author: Bethany Webber
summary: Healthy, quick and easy; what more could you want?
ingredients: 3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into chunks
directions: Heat coconut milk in a large saucepan over low heat
Simmer green beans in coconut milk until soft, about 10 minutes
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir chicken and onion in hot oil until the chicken pieces are no longer pink in the center, about 10 minutes
Stir chicken mixture into the green bean mixture; cook together for 2 minutes
Melt coconut butter and almond butter together in a saucepan over low heat; drizzle over chicken and green beans
